subject: Re: [cc-community] Copyleft presentation for school librarians...
body:
On Tue, 2007-04-17 at 10:53 -0500, Christopher Rios wrote:
> A couple of weeks ago I posted about resources on the history of copyleft.
> This was for a presentation I was giving to future school librarians.
> Several people expressed interest in my finished product. Should I send
> that here or is there someplace else that would be better for that. Sorry,
> I'm not sure what the proper courtesy is for this situation. It's a 10MB
> powerpoint file.

Put it on a website and send the URL.  If you don't have an appropriate
website, there's http://www.scribd.com/ a "youtube for documents".

Got to get them to facilitate CC licensing...

-- 
  http://wiki.creativecommons.org/User:Mike_Linksvayer
